title: Mapledurwell Walks

images.title: Village pond - Mapledurwell by Sandy B, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Village pond. The name Mapledurwell means 'maple tree spring.'

images.title: Andrew Smith / White Hill
images.caption: White Hill. I imagine this slight rise would look pretty white after being freshly ploughed. Viewed from Andwell Drove to the west.

images.title: The Gamekeepers by Colin Smith, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The Gamekeepers

images.title: Andrew Smith / Farmland near Upton Grey
images.caption: Farmland near Upton Grey. Looking roughly northwards. The bridleway follows the hedgerow in a northwesterly direction.

images.title: Andrew Smith / Beeches near Five Lanes End
images.caption: Beeches near Five Lanes End. The trees are on the byway heading west from Five Lanes End and photographed from the byway to the south.

images.title: Village Pond, Upton Grey by Colin Smith, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Village Pond, Upton Grey

images.title: Upton Grey, Hampshire by Brendan and Ruth McCartney, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Upton Grey, Hampshire

description: This Hampshire based village is located just to the south east of Basingstoke . It's a pretty little place with a picturesque village pond and a fine old pub to rest in after your walk. This circular walk from Mapledurwell takes you through the countryside to visit the neighbouring village of Upton Grey. The walk starts in the village and heads south east along Downs Lane to Five Lanes End. You continue south following the course of the old Roman Road into Upton Grey. It's another very pretty settlement with a village pond and some fine looking timber framed cottages. The route then heads north passing Knights Wood and the old church before returning to the village.
